label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_020
content:
## 2024-07-15 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 109
- Active: 96
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 43
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 13

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 35
- Standard: 36
- Placebo: 38

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.9
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 29.7
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.1
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 350.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 36.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 27.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.5
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.6
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 3.5
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.5

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.6
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.0
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 41.1
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.7
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 310.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 50.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 23.6
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.7
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 4.6
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.9

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.5
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 48.2
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.7
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 262.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 38.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.1
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.2
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.0
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 6.1
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.0

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 209
- Sessions Attended: 202
- Attendance Rate (%): 85.7

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.2
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.0
- WBC (k) SD: 1.0
- Platelets (k) Mean: 258
- Platelets (k) SD: 48
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.96
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.18
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 97.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 17.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 22.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 8.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2075, Description: headache, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2008, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2027, Description: dry mouth, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2052, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2012, Description: Sleep diary not returned by subject, Severity: moderate

### Events
- Subject retention call completed for 20 overdue visits
- Opioid conversion table reference updated per FDA guidance
- Blinded interim efficacy data compiled for DSMB

### Notes
- Week 20: Pain management assessments on track. 109 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
